---
### ClaimToHeader

 
If this is specified, one of the claims will be copied to a header
and the route cache will be cleared.

```yaml
"claim": string
"header": string
"append": bool

```

| Field | Type | Description | Default |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |----------- | 
| `claim` | `string` |  |  |
| `header` | `string` |  |  |
| `append` | `bool` |  |  |
